<title level="2" right="Creature 14">[Yurgak](/Monsters.aspx?ID=2146)</title>

<traits>
<trait label="Unique" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=161" />
<trait label="CE" url="/Rules.aspx?ID=95" />
<trait label="Medium" />
<trait label="Ghoul" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=218" />
<trait label="Undead" url="/Traits.aspx?ID=160" />
</traits>

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="tiny">**Source** [Pathfinder #184: The Ghouls Hunger](/Sources.aspx?ID=147) pg. 30</row>

**Perception** +29; [darkvision](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=12)

**Languages**
[Abyssal](/Languages.aspx?ID=12), [Common](/Languages.aspx?ID=1), [Necril](/Languages.aspx?ID=20), [Undercommon](/Languages.aspx?ID=11)

**Skills**
[Acrobatics](/Skills.aspx?ID=1) +24, [Arcana](/Skills.aspx?ID=2) +24, [Crafting](/Skills.aspx?ID=4) +24, [Deception](/Skills.aspx?ID=5) +26, [Intimidation](/Skills.aspx?ID=7) +26, [Medicine](/Skills.aspx?ID=9) +28, [Occultism](/Skills.aspx?ID=11) +24, [Religion](/Skills.aspx?ID=13) +28, [Society](/Skills.aspx?ID=14) +24, [Stealth](/Skills.aspx?ID=15) +26

<row gap="medium">
**Str** +4

**Dex** +6

**Con** +5

**Int** +4

**Wis** +8

**Cha** +6
</row>

**Items**
_[cloak of the bat](/Equipment.aspx?ID=425)_, _+2 [greater striking](/Equipment.aspx?ID=280) [corrosive](/Equipment.aspx?ID=292) [flail](/Weapons.aspx?ID=19)_

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

<row gap="medium">
**AC** 36 

**Fort** +24 

**Ref** +25 

**Will** +28 

</row>

**HP** 240
([negative healing](/MonsterAbilities.aspx?ID=42))

**Immunities**
[death](/Traits.aspx?ID=40) effects, [disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46), [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28), [poison](/Traits.aspx?ID=126), [unconscious](/Conditions.aspx?ID=38)

</column>

---

<column gap="tiny">

**Speed** 30 feet, burrow 5 feet

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
_flail_ +26 ([Disarm](/Traits.aspx?ID=175), [Sweep](/Traits.aspx?ID=194), [Trip](/Traits.aspx?ID=196)),
**Damage** 3d6+10 bludgeoning plus 1d6 acid

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
jaws +27 ([Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 3d12+10 piercing plus ghoul fever and paralysis

**Melee**
<actions string="Single Action" />
claw +27 ([Agile](/Traits.aspx?ID=170), [Finesse](/Traits.aspx?ID=179)),
**Damage** 3d10+10 slashing plus paralysis

**Divine Spells Prepared** DC 34, attack +26
- **Cantrips (7th)**
[Detect Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=66), [Divine Lance](/Spells.aspx?ID=84), [Prestidigitation](/Spells.aspx?ID=229), [Read Aura](/Spells.aspx?ID=246), [Shield](/Spells.aspx?ID=280)
- **1st**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Ray of Enfeeblement](/Spells.aspx?ID=244), [Sanctuary](/Spells.aspx?ID=266)
- **2nd**
[Darkness](/Spells.aspx?ID=59), [See Invisibility](/Spells.aspx?ID=271), [Spiritual Weapon](/Spells.aspx?ID=306)
- **3rd**
[Blindness](/Spells.aspx?ID=26), [Fear](/Spells.aspx?ID=110), [Vampiric Touch](/Spells.aspx?ID=354)
- **4th**
[Freedom of Movement](/Spells.aspx?ID=128), [Silence](/Spells.aspx?ID=287), [Talking Corpse](/Spells.aspx?ID=329)
- **5th**
[Command](/Spells.aspx?ID=45), [Flame Strike](/Spells.aspx?ID=120), [Shadow Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=273)
- **6th**
[Blade Barrier](/Spells.aspx?ID=24), [Spirit Blast](/Spells.aspx?ID=301), [Vampiric Exsanguination](/Spells.aspx?ID=353)
- **7th**
[Dispel Magic](/Spells.aspx?ID=78), [Finger of Death](/Spells.aspx?ID=116), [Harm](/Spells.aspx?ID=146) (Ã—7)

**Rituals** 

- **2nd**
[Corpse Communion](/Rituals.aspx?ID=94)
- **6th**
[Planar Binding](/Rituals.aspx?ID=17)

**Cleric Domain Spells** DC 34, 2 Focus Points
- **7th**
[Overstuff](/Spells.aspx?ID=436), [Touch of Undeath](/Spells.aspx?ID=461)

**Consume Flesh** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Manipulate](/Traits.aspx?ID=104)) **Requirements** The ghoul is adjacent to the corpse of a creature that died within the last hour. **Effect** The ghoul devours a chunk of the corpse and regains 7d6 Hit Points. It can regain Hit Points from any given corpse only once. Yurgak also absorbs a portion of the memories once possessed by the creature she fed upon, potentially revealing secrets held by the flesh at the GM's discretion, and also gains a +1 status bonus to all skill checks for 1 minute.

**Ghoul Fever**  ([Disease](/Traits.aspx?ID=46)) **Saving Throw** Fortitude DC 32; **Stage 1** carrier with no ill effect (1 day); **Stage 2** 2d6 negative damage and regains half as many Hit Points from all healing (1 day); **Stage 3** as stage 2 (1 day); **Stage 4** 2d6 negative damage and gains no benefit from healing (1 day); **Stage 5** as stage 4 (1 day); **Stage 6** dead, and rises as a [ghoul](/MonsterFamilies.aspx?ID=52) the next midnight.

**Paralysis**  ([Incapacitation](/Traits.aspx?ID=93), [Occult](/Traits.aspx?ID=120), [Necromancy](/Traits.aspx?ID=117)) Any living, non-[elf](/Traits.aspx?ID=58) creature hit by a ghoul's attack must succeed at a DC 32 Fortitude save or become [paralyzed](/Conditions.aspx?ID=28). It can attempt a new save at the end of each of its turns, and the DC cumulatively decreases by 1 on each such save.

**Recall Memory** <actions string="Two Actions" /> ([Concentrate](/Traits.aspx?ID=32)) **Frequency** once per day; **Effect** Yurgak focuses her thoughts and recalls a memory from a previously fed-upon corpse. She can attempt to [Recall Knowledge](/Actions.aspx?ID=26) using any [Lore](/Skills.aspx?ID=8) as if she has legendary proficiency with it (+26 on the check).

**Swift Leap** <actions string="Single Action" /> ([Move](/Traits.aspx?ID=114)) The ghoul jumps up to half its Speed. This movement doesn't trigger reactions.

</column>
name: Yurgak
